title: Update failed.
body:
Hello.

Since the new patch came out i keep getting update failed: Unspecified error occurred. Please check logs for more information.

Tried using Hotspot and other vpn, delete files and folders, reinstalled 5 times but still get the same message.
The update starts at 33%, calculating differences about 250-350 files, and then it starts downloading the patch. It runs for about 5 sec, and then the update failed message comes up.

Log: http://pastebin.com/aD931AUJ

replies.body:
Failures at 33% and further are caused by your patcher losing its connection to our patching servers. I suggest working through the steps inside our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address the most common solutions.

Let me know if this helped.
